author: TNN
title: Plantation Drive: CM Yogi Adityanath to Inaugurate 'Ped Lagao, Ped Bachao Jan Abhiyan 2024' in Lucknow | Lucknow News - Times of India
text: Lucknow: CM Yogi Adityanath will inaugurate the ‘Ped Lagao, Ped Bachao Jan Abhiyan 2024’ in Lucknow’s Akbarnagar on July 20. On Thursday, the forest minister along with the team of forest officers visited the site for field inspectionResponding to PM Narendra Modi’s call for ‘Ek Ped Maa Ke Naam’, over 54.2 crore saplings have been nurtured in nurseries in the state.On July 20, offices, schools, and institutions, will halt regular activities for half a day to participate in the drive. Forest minister Arun Kumar Saxena will also plant saplings in Lucknow. Deputy CM Keshav Prasad Maurya will plant saplings in Prayagraj and Kaushambi. Deputy CM Brajesh Pathak will take part in the drive in Unnao and Kanpur Dehat.The ministers-in-charge are mobilizing efforts to ensure the campaign’s success in their respective districts. Agriculture minister Surya Pratap Shahi will plant saplings in Ayodhya and Deoria, and finance minister Suresh Khanna in Shahjahanpur and Pilibhit. Other ministers will plant saplings in the districts assigned.Officers at the level of principal secretary, chief secretary and secretary have been appointed as nodal officers to oversee the drive.Principal secretary, sports and youth welfare, Alok Kumar will be the nodal officer for Lucknow while principal secretary (irrigation and water resources) Anil Garg for Ayodhya. Principal secretary (technical education) M Devaraj is named the nodal officer for Prayagraj. In Varanasi, MD, Jal Mission Gramin, Raj Shekhar will be the nodal officer.In Gorakhpur, sports secretary Suhas LY has been appointed the nodal officer. Garbage accumulation at metro stations also addressed.
